people_research_agent.description: People research agent that searches for information about a person and returns structured data including years of experience, current company, role, and prior companies with reflection-based iterative research.

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key for Anthropic Claude models used for query generation, research analysis, and reflection

TAVILY_API_KEY.description: API key for Tavily search API used for web research

LANGSMITH_API_KEY.description: API key for LangSmith tracing and monitoring (optional)

LANGSMITH_TRACING.description: Enable LangSmith tracing for debugging and monitoring

dockerfile_lines: RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl
